// {{{ NX.Date.getLastDateOfMonth

/**
 * @class NX.Date
 */

/**
 * @method getLastDateOfMonth
 *
 * "write it"
 *
 * @param o {Object} xxx
 * @return {Object}
 */
module.exports = function(date) {
    return new Date(date.getFullYear(), date.getMonth(), NX.Date.getDaysInMonth(date));
};

// }}}

/*
 * Local variables:
 * tab-width: 4
 * c-basic-offset: 4
 * c-hanging-comment-ender-p: nil
 * End:
 */
